title: 225: Answering Sex & Relationship Questions!
itunes:title: 225: Answering Sex & Relationship Questions!
description:
The Broads answer some of the #broadsquad’s sex and relationships questions! They chat about the best time of day to have sex, the question “how often do you have sex”, some wild sex stories, knowing when you’ve met “the one”, getting married young, exploring new fantasies, and much more! 

***Join The Broads this Thursday for the latest Bachelor recap!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***JENNI KAYNE: Get 15% off your first order when you use code CHATTY at checkout at jennikayne.com
